name: The Apocalyptic Shuddering of the Strawberry Earth Mother
name_original: The Apocalyptic Shuddering of the Strawberry Earth Mother
description:
My entry for the 7DRL Challenge. A cute, small roguelike inspired by Michael Brough's games and my first roguelike game ever! I used Jeremiah Reid's Javascript Broughlike tutorial code as the foundation for my game.

The Strawberry Earth Mother is appalled at the pests invading and destroying her garden and she has something to say about it. Much shuddering will occur.

UPDATE FROM v1:

Moles no longer destroy the Exit tile!

Powers have been added, easing the difficulty level! Gather strawberries to gain more power! 3X = A NEW POWER!

Audio volume has been tweaked.

BUGS -

The bird is supposed to steal your strawberries, currently it just flies around. It will eat them still if it hits the tile where they are.

Any other bugs? Let me know down in the comments!
